Context.description: Represents the context for building URLs related to Polarion services

baseUrl.description: Returns the base URL constructed with the extension context

extensionContext.description: The extension context used as a base for URL construction

restUrl.description: Returns the REST API URL constructed with the extension context

swaggerUiUrl.description: Returns the Swagger UI URL for the REST API

ConverterJobDetails.description: Details of the converter job including status and error message if any

errorMessage.description: Error message if the conversion failed

projectId.description: The unique identifier for the project

spaceId.description: The unique identifier of the space within the project

baselineRevision.description: The specific revision of the provided baseline

cutEmptyChapters.description: Empty chapters should be removed from the document

cutEmptyWIAttributes.description: Empty work item attributes should be removed from the document

cutLocalUrls.description: Local Polarion URLs should be removed from the document

fileName.description: Target file name of exported document

projectId.description: The unique identifier for the project

removalSelector.description: CSS-like selector for elements to remove

renderComments.description: Which comments should be rendered in the exported document

revision.description: The specific revision of the document

additionalProperties.description: Map of attributes extracted from the URL

urlQueryParameters.description: Map of attributes extracted from the URL

bundleTimestamp.description: The bundle timestamp of the setting

bundleBuildTimestamp.description: The build timestamp of the bundle
